Bottles and teats
You	might	find	it	useful	to	have	
about six bottles and teats, 
so you can always have at 
least one or two bottles clean, 
sterilised and ready for use.
You should always buy new 
teats for your new baby. They 
come	in	different	shapes	and	
with	different	hole	sizes,	and	
you may have to try several
